Description:
Escaped from the island teeming dead Bana tourists naively believed that this trial is over. But they are deeply mistaken. After leaving the damned island by helicopter, the characters moved to a military ship. It seemed that the nightmare is in the past, but a sudden storm threw Palaney survivors to the island, which also entered an insidious virus that turns people into zombies. The struggle for survival unfolded with a bang! Dead Island: Riptide is a hurricane of cooperative action with RPG elements and an open game world. Look forward to: new locations, even more terrifying enemies and powerful new weapons. In addition, the company Bano people get away with adding a new character - Chef with a warship, John Morgan. This magnificent five and will make every effort to leave the cursed island, thereby saving their lives.

Features:
" A great first person shooter with an open game world and an awesome multiplayer.
" Nightmare continues. Characters of the original game throws on another island of the same archipelago, which is also full of the undead.
" New locations, enemies and weapons, as well as a new vehicle - the boat.
" Old familiar characters and a new playable character - John Morgan, a chef with a warship.

Release Features:
" Game Version - 1.4.1.1.13
" Downloaded 19 August 2013
" Fully consistent with the activated Steam licensed version of the game. 
" Steam Application ID: 216250 
" The signature of purchase: Dead Island Riptide (Steam Store)

" Game content is fully packed in a simple installer with little compression.
